div.a: Please visit our Virtual Learning page for important updates.

p.a: Anuncios de HJB - 1 de abril de 2020

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Monday, March 23 will be normal food distribution from 10:00-11:00 a.m. Each child will get breakfast and lunch for the day.

Tuesday, March 24 we will transition to weekly food pickups from 10:00a.m. - 12:00 p.m. Each student will receive enough food to last 5 school days (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and the following Monday).
From there on out, food pickup will ONLY be on Tuesdays.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Hugh J. Boyd, Jr. Elementary School is closed Monday, March 16 until further notice to prevent the possible spread of COVID-19.
Breakfast and lunch will be served from 10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. in the front of the school.

img.span: Hugh J Boyd Elementary School PreK Flyer.pdf

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: Welcome to the Hugh J. Boyd, Jr. Elementary School of the Seaside Heights School District.

div.p: Nestled between the Atlantic Ocean and Barnegat Bay, our strong school community works together to help students grow socially, academically, and emotionally. You will find our students engaged in activities ranging from reading, writing in journals, thinking through math problems, and investigating the world around us.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: We invite you to learn more about the Boyd Blue Dolphins by browsing our website.
